messages.content:
We face a choice on Thursday.
It's between investment in our future with Labour or five more years of Tory government - and in Manchester, we know that means more cuts to our schools, local government and the NHS. Our city has been hit hard since 2010 under the Conservatives and Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support Labour's plans to invest in 10,000 extra police officers. Under the Tories and Lib Dems, Greater Manchester Police has lost a quarter of officers and the strain shows.
Fight for proper funding for our schools. Under Tory plans, every school in south Manchester loses out.
Oppose a Tory 'hard Brexit', which would fail to protect jobs and safeguard rights.
Back Labour plans to build a million new homes and give new rights to private renters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Labour will stop more cuts.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose a Tory 'hard Brexit', which would fail to protect jobs and safeguard rights.

community.content: Back Labour plans to build a million new homes and give new rights to private renters.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've been proud to work hard serving this area since you elected me in 2015. I've not been afraid to stand up for the interests of this area even when it was difficult. I've dealt with over 10,000 casework enquiries in the last four years, holding weekly advice surgeries and regular coffee mornings.

examples: I've dealt with over 10,000 casework enquiries in the last four years, holding weekly advice surgeries and regular coffee mornings.
We face a choice on Thursday.
It's between investment in our future with Labour or five more years of Tory government.
Only a vote for Labour will stop more cuts.
Our city has been hit hard since 2010 under the Conservatives and Liberal Democrats.
